title: Conquered
description: Vivianne.I've been blinded by lust, beauty, and the intoxicating, innocent magic that makes her irresistible...What have I done? Her life is at risk because of me. Because of my monstrous past. I promise myself I will rescue her and make sure she is protected for the rest of her life. That she has whatever she needs... And most importantly, I will stay far away from her. I will never hurt her again. I am no longer that man. I can no longer be William Sinclair. I am now Sin.
author: Colet Abedi
